snippet: The last movie of Peter Jackson's three "Hobbit" films rode to the top of U.S. and Canadian weekend box office charts, selling an estimated $56.2 million worth of tickets and boosting the holiday movie season that is crucial to Hollywood....

headline.print_headline: Final 'Hobbit' Film Draws Holiday Season Crowds at Box Office
headline.main: Final 'Hobbit' Film Draws Holiday Season Crowds at Box Office

lead_paragraph: The last movie of Peter Jackson's three "Hobbit" films rode to the top of U.S. and Canadian weekend box office charts, selling an estimated $56.2 million worth of tickets and boosting the holiday movie season that is crucial to Hollywood.
